text: 'ara'ayt -ayha alrswl- 'aejab min hal hwla' alyhwd aldhyn 'atahum allah hza min alkitab faealimuu 'ana ma jit bih hu alhq, yudewn 'iilaa ma ja' fi kitab allah -whw alqran- lyfsl baynahum fima akhtalafuu fyh, fa'iin lam ywafq 'ahwa'ahum yab kathir minhum hakam allh; li'ana min eadthm al'ierad ean alhq?
